title: Stadium construction/renovation costs UEFA EURO 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction/renovation costs in million euros for 9 number of Stadiumss.

The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and lowest at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).
The highest Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 321.0 more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than the lowest Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Stadiums in the x axis and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in the y axis.

The maximum Construction/renovation costs in million euros 381.0 is found at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and the minimum is found at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) where Construction/renovation costs in million euros is 60.0.
There is a difference of 321.0 between the maximum Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and minimum Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

Construction/renovation costs in million euros at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is 381.0 , second place is  at 381.0, and thirdly is Stade Vélodrome Marseille (major renovation) at 267.0.
Stadiums Stade Bollaert Lens (major renovation), and Stade Geoffroy Guichard Saint-Etienne (major renovation) share the same value 75.0.
